original_text: Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height was like the height of the cedars, and he was strong as the oaks; yet I destroyed his fruit from above, and his roots from beneath.
korean_text: 내가 아모리 사람을 그들 앞에서 멸하였나니 그 키는 백향목 높이와 같고 강하기는 상수리나무 같으나 내가 그 위의 열매와 그 아래의 뿌리를 진멸하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 그들 앞에서 아모리 족속을 멸하였으니

sentences.original_text: whose height was like the height of the cedars
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 키는 레바논 백향목의 높이와 같고

sentences.original_text: and he was strong as the oaks
yet I destroyed his fruit from above
